It’s just a list of more or less random questions I’ve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007). 1. A habit that changed your life? Getting up early. For most of my life I was a night owl, and when I had Connor that all changed. When she was an infant, I started waking up at the crack of dawn to sneak in work before she woke up in the morning. The habit ended up sticking, and now I’m an early bird. 2. Fruit or cupcakes? As much as I love a small cake smothered in frosting, I’m gonna have to go with fruit. 3. html:
So…what is the Monday Poll?

Excellent question! It isn’t, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. It’s just a list of more or less random questions I’ve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007).

1. A habit that changed your life?

Getting up early. For most of my life I was a night owl, and when I had Connor that all changed. When she was an infant, I started waking up at the crack of dawn to sneak in work before she woke up in the morning. The habit ended up sticking, and now I’m an early bird.

2. Fruit or cupcakes?

As much as I love a small cake smothered in frosting, I’m gonna have to go with fruit.

3. Are you doing any advent calendars this year?

At Trader Joe’s a couple weeks ago, I picked up a few for the “kids” – Connor, Rosie and Marnie. Ha ha ha!

4. Something on your Christmas list?

Honestly, I have no idea where I’d put it (when and why did our house become inundated with STUFF?), and I totally don’t need it, but I would love a three-tiered serving plate for little sandwiches and cakes for afternoon tea.

5. Something on your to-do list this week?

Gotta start Christmas shopping right meow! I really left it up to the last minute this year.

Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict,

Karen

P.S. Here are the questions to copy/paste with your answers in a comment. Talk to ya soon.

1. A habit that changed your life?
2. Fruit or cupcakes?
3. Are you doing any advent calendars this year?
4. Something on your Christmas list?
5. Something on your to-do list this week?

Reader Interactions
